data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Jaisalmer. Through your servants plant 133 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Jaisalmer to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 7,369 believers living in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Brahmin Srimali people. Make the Brahmin Srimali people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, teach the 7,369 believers in Jaisalmer that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Jaisalmer against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India has a population of 669,900.

We estimate Jaisalmer has 7,369 people who might know Jesus, 8,128 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 654,403 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 654,403 who are far from you in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
